content: this is an easily-adaptable hat pattern with a folded brim for a medium-weight yarn -- great for one skein of yarn you don t know what to do with or my new favorite using handspun it s worked entirely in 1x1 rib and i mostly wrote this pattern because i m sick of not having a pattern to reference when i m adding to rav maybe you ll get some use out of it too skills * twisted german cast on * knitting purling * decreasing needles as written use a 16 us 5/3 75mm needle or whatever you need to get gauge and a corresponding needle to knit small circumference magic loop dpn 2 circulars
